channel.title: Posts on WardenSMP
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on WardenSMP

item.title: Welcome to the WardenSMP website!
item.description: WardenSMP is a Minecraft Java survival server with plenty to do! We are currently about to start the 4th season and plan to stick with the vanilla base game! Please note that this is a closed sever, so only people that know the owner or have been invited by a member are permitted to join. To join, please contact _A13x either personally or using this email address: alexbogo2007@protonmail.com. Please join our Google Chat groups to receive announcements and to communicate.
item.content:
WardenSMP is a Minecraft Java survival server with plenty to do! We are currently about to start the 4th season and plan to stick with the vanilla base game! Please note that this is a closed sever, so only people that know the owner or have been invited by a member are permitted to join. To join, please contact _A13x either personally or using this email address: alexbogo2007@protonmail.com. Please join our Google Chat groups to receive announcements and to communicate.

You can also check out our [rules and guideliness]!

If you’d like, you can check out the WardenSMP Season 1 Recap

Season 2 and 3 recaps are coming soon!
